title: Reviving India's Ancient Maritime Glory: INSV Kaundinya Sets Sail For Maiden Voyage To Oman
description: The 65-feet-long INSV Kaundinya, carrying 18 sailors, will cover a distance of 1,400 km and reach the shore of Oman after 15 days at sea.

title: Ancient meditation practices find new life in modern religious communities across America
description: On most Monday nights, the sanctuary of All Saints Episcopal Church — with its vaulted ceilings, stone arches and stained-glass windows — seamlessly transforms into a space of quiet contemplation.
